Subject: Would People Ever Stop Attacking The Poor Ark?!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 107

::Striker::

Striker groans as he feels the vibrations from the shots hitting the Ark. He 
also makes his way out, taking out his gun as he runs, his shoulder blasters 
emerging, ready for battle. As he runs out of the Ark, he glances at the 
hull, frowning as he sees it cave in on itself due to the shots.

"Will they ever get the idea that attacking here is pointless?!" Striker 
mutters to himself, firing at Rush.
